Thomas n/a

  1. Foster Name: Thomas D.
  2. Foster Family: James Hide
  3. Location of Family: Madison, NE
  4. Sending Organization: n/a
  5. Arrival Place: Unknown
  6. Age on Arrival: Unknown
  7. Date of Birth: Unknown
  8. Gender: male
  9. Notes: In 1910 Federal Census, at the age of 3 years and 8 months, Thomas is listed as the adopted son of James and Lucy Hide. See 1910 United States Federal Census.
